query.statement:
SELECT A.MANDT AS MANDT , '' AS FLAG , A.DOCNO AS DOCNO , A.DOCKIND AS DOCKIND , A.APPGUBN AS APPGUBN , A.SEQNO AS SEQNO , A.SEQSTAT AS SEQSTAT , A.APDPT1 AS APDPT1 , A.APDPT1_N AS APDPT1_N , A.APNUM AS APNUM , A.APRNK AS APRNK , A.APIRUM AS APIRUM , A.APDATE AS APDATE , A.APTIM AS APTIM , A.APDESC AS APDESC , VALUE(C.CS121_SPT,'') AS SPT , VALUE(C.CS121_UPN,'') AS PJT , (SELECT CASE MAX(GBU) WHEN '1' THEN 'Á÷¿µ' ELSE 'Çù·Â»ç' END FROM SAPHEE.ZCST111 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND PJT = VALUE(B.PJT,'') AND HST <> 'D') GBU FROM SAPHEE.ZWBAP02 A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT CS126_DNO DNO, MAX(CS126_UPN) UPN, MAX(CS126_CST) CST, MAX(CS126_PJT) PJT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS126_DNO = #DOCNO# GROUP BY CS126_DNO ) B ON B.DNO = A.DOCNO INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST121 C ON C.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND C.CS121_UPN = B.UPN AND C.CS121_CST = B.CST WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.DOCNO = #DOCNO# AND A.DOCKIND = #DOCKIND#
ORDER BY A.MANDT, A.DOCNO, A.DOCKIND, A.APPGUBN, A.SEQNO DESC FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
